name: Columbia Men's Flare Gun Fleece Over Shirt
description: The Columbia Men’s Flare Gun™ Over Shirt brings classic, workwear style to your outdoor wardrobe. A perfect outer layer for a casual hike, campout, or just cool weather solution. The versatile style and rich patterns will keep you warm on chilly outdoor mornings. Available in a range of robust earthen colored designs.

name: Legendary Whitetails Women's Cottage Escape Flannel Shirt
description: Let loose in our timeless flannel, featuring a classic design with chambray lined collar and cuffs. Made of soft brushed mid-weight cotton flannel, this yarn-dyed shirt is just right and very comfortable. Wear it alone or layer up during those brisk fall days. Pairs perfectly with our Womens Quilted Vest.

name: Legendary Whitetails Women's Trail Guide Fleece Button Down Shirt
description: Hit the trail wearing the perfect shirt for the job. Polyester knit is brushed for buttery softness, inside and out. The stylish, yet functional, design boasts a button front with Legendary engraved buttons, a faux leather Signature Buck patch, and stylish patterns.

name: Legendary Whitetails Women's Saddle Country Shirt Jacket
Legendary Whitetails Women's Legendary Flannel Shirt
description: This women's Legendary Flannel Shirt has a relaxed boyfriend fit in the softest brushed flannel we could find. With the suede-like lined collar and cuffs, you'll want to collect all of the colors!

name: Legendary Whitetails Women's Open Spaces Dress
